channel.title: Adding barrows shop plz! help ~ sid
channel.description:
i need help to add a barrows shop plz im a bit confused so plz if someone got a link to guide me to add a shop or someone post thier code plz thank you v much!
[glow=red,2,300]common help!!! [/glow]
IP - 219.88.83.217 PORT - 43594
[quote] MERRY X MAS TO ALL IN NEWZEALAND TODAY!! W00T

item.title: Adding barrows shop plz! help ~ sid
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

ok ill help lol… 2secs[br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2007, 08:35:23 AM[/size][hr]what source do u use testscape,project 16, cheezscape and so on>[br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2007, 08:35:48 AM[/size][hr]well most of em do dis

ill just do myn for u ok

go into autospawn.cfg and go down to

spawn = 553 2855 9643 0 0 0 0 0 1 Varrock Aubury at Magic shop

and den go to end where it ses magic shop press enter and then paste in

spawn = 519 3240 3433 0 0 0 0 0 1 Descript

then save and exit open up shop.cfg and go to bottom and under the last shop type in

shop = 42 Bob_Barrows 2 2 4716 1000 4718 1000 4720 1000 4722 1000 4708 1000 4710 1000 4712 1000 4714 1000 4753 1000 4755 1000 4757 1000 4759 1000 4745 1000 4747 1000 4749 1000 4751 1000 4732 1000 4734 1000 4736 1000 4738 1000 4724 1000 4726 1000 4728 1000 4730 1000
change the 42 to woteva the next shop number is so if u last shop is 20 make this one 21… so on

ok now save and exit shop.cfg … open up client.java and search for

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop
then at Magic Shop(click enter here)
so now you have got a gap and then in gap type in

} else if (NPCID == 519) { //Bob Barrows PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; //Bob Barrows
and again change da WanneShop = 42 to the shop number u put in shop.cfg for barrows shop hope u get dis … ill add pics for u



Read full topic
item.source: Adding barrows shop plz! help ~ sid
